description:
A Federation Forces cadet assigned to the training ship Space Ark, who is now the closest thing the ship has to a regular mobile suit pilot. Though given to sarcastic wisecracks, Birgit is actually kindly and good-natured, and he provides Seabook with support and encouragement when the young civilian is pressed into duty as a substitute pilot.
Source: Official Site
name: Berghito Pirieau
